items.title: Nigeria's economy grows by 4.23 pct in Q2 2025
items.summary: ABUJA, Sept. 22 (Xinhua) -- Nigeria's gross domestic product (GDP) expanded by 4.23 percent year-on-year in real terms in the second quarter (Q2) of 2025, the National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) said in a report released on Monday. Read full story

items.title: Amazon drops Jackery’s HomePower 3000 LiFePO4 station to a new $1,299 low (Reg. $2,499), bundles start from $1,499
items.summary:
Update 9/22: Jackery has dropped the price lower than ever on its HomePower 3000 station and bundles starting from a new $1,299 all-time low. Prices have been adjusted below.

By way of its official Amazon storefront, Jackery has dropped its new HomePower 3000 Portable Power Station down to its lowest rate of $1,499 shipped, which has several discounted bundle options (listed below the fold) and is matching the price we’re currently seeing from the brand’s direct website. This new backup power solution has only been on the market since May, normally carrying a $2,499 full price tag, which we’ve mostly seen drop down between $1,899 and $1,699, though recently it’s fallen to $1,599 on Amazon and the $1,499 low during the most recent direct sale. Now that low price is sliding over to Amazon for the first time, giving you $1,000 off the going rate. You can also find the launch deals on the brand’s new HomePower 3600 Plus station and bundles starting from $1,699 through September 21.

more…

items.title: Finland forecasts modest growth, warns of structural fiscal imbalance
items.summary: HELSINKI, Sept. 22 (Xinhua) -- The Finnish economy is slowly recovering from recession, with modest growth ahead but persistent challenges in employment and public finances, the Ministry of Finance said in its autumn forecast released Monday. Read full story

items.title: Google adds Gemini to Google TV, starting on TCL's new QM9K series TVs and expanding to Google TV Streamer 4K and other major TV brands later in 2025 (Andrew Liszewski/The Verge)
items.summary:
Andrew Liszewski / The Verge:
Google adds Gemini to Google TV, starting on TCL's new QM9K series TVs and expanding to Google TV Streamer 4K and other major TV brands later in 2025  —  TCL's QM9K series TVs will be the first to offer Gemini on Google TV, with more devices getting it later this year.

items.title: Charities end links with 'Fergie', UK's Duchess of York, over Epstein email
items.summary: LONDON (Reuters) -Several charities said on Monday they had cut their links with Sarah Ferguson, Britain's Duchess of York, after media reports that she had described the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein as a "supreme friend" in an email. Read full story

items.title: Trial of South Sudan's first vice president begins
items.summary: JUBA, Sept. 22 (Xinhua) -- The trial of South Sudan's suspended First Vice President Riek Machar and seven co-accused on charges of treason, murder, and crimes against humanity began in Juba, the country's capital, on Monday. Read full story

items.summary: He's travelled roads and forded streams but Emil the elk's wanderings have now come to an end in Austria.

items.title: Northern Myanmar criminal group on trial in China over killings, telecom fraud
items.summary: SHENZHEN, Sept. 22 (Xinhua) -- A court in southern China has tried 21 members of a criminal group that operates in northern Myanmar on charges including fraud, intentional homicide, intentional injury, kidnapping, extortion, operating casinos, organizing and forcing prostitution, illegal detention, and drug smuggling and manufacturing. Read full story

items.title: Kenya's SGR operator launches training program to boost technical skills of local staff
items.summary: NAIROBI, Sept. 22 (Xinhua) -- Afristar, operator of the Chinese-built Standard Gauge Railway (SGR) in Kenya, has launched a six-month training program with professors from China's Guangzhou Railway Polytechnic to help improve the technical skills of local staff. Read full story

items.title: KLM cancels 119 flights as ground staff strike continues
items.summary: THE HAGUE, Sept. 22 (Xinhua) -- Dutch airline KLM said on Monday that it will cancel 119 flights and reschedule dozens more on Wednesday as ground crew stage their third strike this month in a pay dispute. Read full story

items.title: Airport chaos highlights rise in high-profile ransomware attacks, cyber experts say
items.summary: LONDON (Reuters) -Cybercriminals are taking greater risks by hitting high-profile targets to get bigger payoffs and boost their online reputational clout, cybersecurity experts said, after a weekend hack crippled airport check-in systems across Europe and stranded thousands of passengers. Read full story

items.title: EcoFlow’s Early Prime Day Sale increases power station discounts up to 65% with bonus savings, free gifts, and more from $169
items.summary:
EcoFlow has launched its Early Prime Day Sale through October 6, which is increasing discounts on power stations up to 65% off, complete with bonus sitewide savings, free gifts at certain pricing thresholds, and even additional bulk savings when buying five or more items. Among the lineup, there is a direct-sale-only offer on the DELTA 2 Portable Power Station bundled with a smart extra battery and two 110W solar panels for $892.05 shipped, after using the sitewide code 25PDFAFF at checkout for an additional 5% savings. This bundle would normally run you $2,646 at full price, and would currently cost you $1,379 buying the power station/battery bundle with two 110W panels separately at Amazon. We’ve seen this kit dropped down to $999 in direct sales before this event, with the $1,754 markdown here dropping things to a new all-time low price. Head below to get the rundown on all the extra ways to save and the full lineup of deals.

more…

items.summary:
As part of its Deals of the Day, Best Buy is offering the Anker SOLIX C300X DC 90,000mAh Portable Power Station with a 60W solar panel at $235.99 shipped. We’ve been seeing this combo bundle pop up every two to four weeks over the last few months, dropping from its usual $330 price tag, with it coming in $1 lower than the previous one-day sales. You’ll only find its grey variant sitting at higher rates at Amazon (currently $250) and Anker’s direct website (currently $270), with discounts on those alternate colorways having mostly dropped costs to $250 and had fallen as low as $220 in February. For the rest of the day only, you can pick up this solar generator bundle at the third-best price of 2025 and the fourth-lowest overall, which sits $46 above the all-time low that last appeared during Black Friday.

items.title: Z GRILLS’ Cruiser tailgate companion portable pellet grill & smoker hits best price of the year at new $150 low
items.summary:
Update 9/22: Z GRILLS has dropped the price further on its Cruiser 200A Portable Pellet Grill and Smoker to a new all-time low of $150.05 shipped.

Through its official Amazon storefront, Z GRILLS is offering its Cruiser 200A Pro Portable Pellet Grill and Smoker for $217.55 shipped. While it carries a $335 MSRP, it usually starts lower between $273 and $289 at Amazon, with prices having kept above $236 throughout 2025. While we have seen it go as low as $215 in the past, you’re looking at a $117 markdown off the MSRP for the best price we have seen this year and the second-lowest overall. It’s a great opportunity to stock up for your tailgating season or fall outings while it lasts. Head below to learn more about what it brings to your gatherings.

That marks the lowest price we’ve tracked yet for this new PC case, which comes bundled with three RGB fans. For those who want to step up, Newegg also has a more premium Ambience Pro version featuring atmospheric RGB lighting and an ARGB controller for $199.99 shipped, down from its regular $275. Head below for more details.

But for today only, you can get an extra 10% off all of these titles (and much more) to a maximum of $20 off when checking out with the Woot app – all of the details are waiting right here. This offer is only available for today only and stacks on top of the already discounted pricing. That means the Mario Kart World deal, for example, will drop from the $69.99 sale price down to $62.99 Prime shipped – that’s one of the lowest prices this Switch 2 game has ever been offered for with nearly 22% slashed from its regular $80 list price. But again, the bonus app savings applies to just about every single game on the Woot sale for today only. 

Nintendo Switch 2 now up for purchase at Amazon with no invitation needed…have any store credit to use?

  • Nintendo Switch 2 at Amazon $449
  • Nintendo Switch 2 + Mario Kart Bundle at Amazon
more…

items.title: Don’t miss out on Anker’s popular PowerCore Reserve 60,000mAh power station while it’s back at $80 (Reg. $150)
items.summary:
Through the official Amazon storefront, Anker is giving folks another chance at its PowerCore Reserve 60,000mAh Power Station for $79.99 shipped in both of its colorways, which beats out the brand’s direct website pricing by $67. Without discounts, you’d be shelling out $150 in total for this popular model, with the discounts we have seen often dropping the price between $110 and $90, with a few falls lower to $80, and a one-time drop to its $75 low back during July’s Prime Day event. Outside of that short-lived Prime Day pricing, you’re looking at the best price we have seen repeat over the year, giving you $70 in savings and landing it back at its second-lowest overall price a month after its last appearance.

more…

items.title: Razer’s pro-grade Wolverine V3 controller with Hall effect sticks just hit a new all-time low at $65
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find Razer’s latest Wolverine V3 Tournament Edition wired gaming controller in black for $64.99 shipped. This model in black normally retails for $100, but it’s now seeing its biggest price drop to date at $35 off. The white version has been fetching $70 at Woot for a while now as part of its video game sale, but Amazon is now undercutting that by $5 with the black model. If you’re interested in going wireless, there’s also a variant available for $149.99 shipped at Woot. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Samsung has an ultra-thin phone of its own, and you can land the S25 Edge at $400 off via Amazon right now
items.summary:
You can still land $300 off the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, but with Apple’s new Phone Air making headlines everywhere, we wanted to highlight the straight up $400 cash discount on the Samsung S25 Edge. All things considered, the S25 Edge actually has the edge in some respects on Apple’s ultra-thin new phone – it was really just the expensive price tag on the S25 Edge that turned most Android users off. That said, you can land one right now at Amazon with a giant $400 discount. 

more…
